entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
